Text: How do you feel about dead rats?

choice1.Text: I didn't come here to mess around. Fuck off, asshole.

choice2.Text: I can work with that. So, now that we've gotten to know each other a little better, wanna bang?

choice1.Value: Wait, how do the dead rats factor into this?

choice2.Value: Sure, as long as you are down for some rat play.
